longDescription: Databricks recommends migrating workloads to the latest or LTS version of its runtime for enhanced stability and support. If on Runtime 11.3 LTS or above, move directly to the latest 12.x version. If below, first migrate to 11.3 LTS, then to the latest 12.x version as per the migration guide.
description: Databricks runtime version is not latest or is not LTS version
